verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:27
verses.text: Let me pass through thy land: I will go along by the high way, I will neither turn unto the right hand nor to the left.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:28
verses.text: Thou shalt sell me meat for money, that I may eat; and give me water for money, that I may drink: only I will pass through on my feet;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:29
verses.text: (As the children of Esau which dwell in Seir, and the Moabites which dwell in Ar, did unto me;) until I shall pass over Jordan into the land which the Lord our God giveth us.
